summary: Larger population to The Ragged Flagon.
descriptionHtml:
Please forgive me if this Mod is poorly done, it\'s my first one and I\'m a bit of a modifying noob :P


Adds more Thieves Guild members and Bar Patrons to the Ragged Flagon.  

Adds:
- More members of different races
- An extra bar man
- Bar Patrons

Notes:

The NPC\'s added to the Flagon are given guild and flagon status, however they are only there for atmosphere, so appart from a \'Hello!\' they don\'t really speak much :D

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Next Update:


I will be adding a Bard and I\'m going to attempt to learn how to add Tavern music too :)
author: Finbarr
